meaning: character, letter, word, section of village

onyomiExamples.meaning: character (esp. kanji), letter, written text, handwriting, penmanship, the ... word (e.g. "the L word" = "love")

kunyomiExamples.meaning: Chinese courtesy name (name formerly given to adult Chinese men, used in place of their given name in formal situations), nickname, section of a village
